item.title: Court allows De Lima to vote in May 13 polls
item.description: MANILA - A Muntinlupa court has granted detained Sen. Leila de Lima's request for furlough to vote during the May 13 elections.

item.title: Religious bloc voting, nasusunod ba?
item.description: Tuwing halalan karaniwan nang sinusuyo ng mga kandidato ang mga malalaking grupo kabilang na ang mga simbahan.

item.title: Comelec begins final testing, sealing of vote counting machines
item.description: Another Philippine town hit by election-related violence is placed under control of the Commission on Elections as it makes final preparation for next Monday's nationwide voting.

item.title: 'Otso' bets nanawagan ng patas na imbestigasyon sa mga paratang ni 'Bikoy'
item.description: Nanawagan ang ilang nasa opposition slate na magkaroon ng patas na imbestigasyon sa mga bintang ni "Bikoy."

item.title: Grupo naglabas ng hotline para protektahan ang mga guro sa halalan
item.description: Naglabas ng hotlines ang grupo ng mga guro para protektahan ang mga kasamahan nila sa halalan.

item.title: Patakaran sakaling lumindol sa halalan, inaayos ng Comelec
item.description: Pinaplantsa na ng Comelec ang patakaran nila sakaling lumindol habang nagbobotohan.

item.title: Comelec rejects petition vs Cayetano congressional bid
item.description: The Comelec cleared the lone roadblock to former Foreign Secretary Alan Peter Cayetano’s congressional run, rejecting a petition questioning his candidacy over residency.

item.title: Dry run ng provincial bus ban sa EDSA itinigil muna
item.description: Pansamantala munang itinigil ng MMDA ang dry run ng pag-alis ng mga provincial bus sa EDSA.

item.title: Otso Diretso ends provincial sorties in vote-rich Cavite
item.description: KAWIT, Cavite - Otso Diretso ended its series of provincial campaign rallies on Monday in vote-rich Cavite province, one of the areas that delivered a win for President Rodrigo Duterte in 2016.

item.title: Comelec division disqualifies Edu Manzano
item.description: MANILA - (UPDATE) The Commission on Elections (Comelec) second division has disqualified actor Edu Manzano from running for congressman of San Juan.

item.title: 'NOW SHOWING': Comelec to look into digital shorts starring senatorial bets
item.description: “These are well-produced digital shorts. Let’s not call it a commercial anymore, it’s almost a short movie, right?" says Comelec spokesperson James Jimenez.

item.title: Bong Go bares back anew after 'Bikoy' surfaces
item.description: MANILA - Senatorial candidate Christopher "Bong" Go bared his back anew Monday to show he has no tattoo, debunking claims that he has ties to narcotics syndicates.

item.title: A closer look at the senatorial survey leaders
item.description: Comprehensive profiles of the senatorial candidates who have consistently figured on top of the surveys since last year.

item.title: 10 tagasuporta ni Jonvic Remulla kinasuhan ng 'vote-buying'
item.description: Kinasuhan ngayong Lunes ang 10 tagasuporta ng tumatakbong gobernador ng Cavite na si Jonvic Remulla dahil sa umano ay pamimili ng boto.

item.title: PNP urges public to report vote-buying
item.description: A week before the midterm elections, the Philippine National Police urged the public Monday to report cases of vote-buying.

item.title: El Shaddai leader's senatorial list not an endorsement for bloc vote - adviser
item.description: El Shaddai, a 5-million strong flock, does not have a bloc vote and a previously commissioned study showed only 40 percent of their total members would follow Velarde "blindly," said political adviser Wilfrido Villarama.

item.title: Fariñas says he'll back Imee's Senate bid despite 'wrong' tobacco tax use
item.description: Ilocos Norte 1st District Rep. Rodolfo Fariñas on Monday said he was "beholden" to his constituents to support the senatorial bid of Gov. Imee Marcos -- even if he believes that the allocation of tobacco taxes under her leadership was "wrong."

item.title: Duterte 'controls the situation' with pro-admin Senate slate poised to win: analyst
item.description: The President is looking at "relatively calm political waters" ahead, with the administration-backed slate poised to dominate the midterm elections.

item.title: Comelec confident of finding new citizen arm 1 week before polls
item.description: The Commission on Elections (Comelec) is confident that it can find a new partner for the random manual audit a week before the midterm elections.

item.title: Comelec sends 1 million new ballot markers
item.description: MANILA- The Commission on Elections (Comelec) said Monday it is sending 1 million new ballot markers to polling precincts a week before election day.

item.title: 'Bato', Bong Go at Koko Pimentel, nanuyo ng mga botante sa Mandaluyong
item.description: Tatlo sa limang tumatakbo sa pagkasenador na personal na inendorso ni Pangulong Rodrigo Duterte ang dumalo sa campaign rally ng PDP Laban sa Mandaluyong City Linggo.

item.title: Pia Cayetano nagmaneho ng padyak, nagbenta ng kakanin sa Cebu
item.description: CEBU CITY -- Sumakay ng padyak at tinulugan ni Taguig Rep. Pia Cayetano na magbenta ng kakanin ang ilang vendor sa kaniyang pagbisita sa Carbon Public Market sa lungsod na ito, Linggo.

item.title: Poll ballots arrive in Manila, 2 'torn' seals flagged
item.description: Election ballots that will be used for the May 13 midterm polls were voting precincts in the capital on Sunday, with some watchdogs raising the flag on several torn seals.

item.title: 'What does honesty mean to you?': Otso Diretso questions El Shaddai support for rivals
item.description: Some members of the opposition slate Otso Diretso on Sunday questioned Catholic charismatic group El Shaddai's endorsement of 14 senatorial candidates.

item.title: Kris Aquino lauds opposition bet Chel Diokno
item.description: Kris Aquino on Sunday said she admires opposition senatorial Chel Diokno, just weeks after blasting the camp of his ally, former Interior Secretary Mar Roxas.

item.title: Don't overvote, Comelec warns anew
item.description: The Comelec said this will cause the voting machine to invalidate a ballot's votes cast for overvoted positions.

item.title: LOOK: Bam Aquino, Imee Marcos share table at El Shaddai event
item.description: Senators Bam Aquino, JV Ejercito and Sonny Angara share a table with aspiring senator Imee Marcos at an event organized by religious group El Shaddai.

item.title: Escudero’s tip to incoming peers? Read up on Senate rules, procedures
item.description: Outgoing Sen. Francis “Chiz” Escudero Escudero said he believes the next batch of senators will remain independent from the administration.

item.title: 14 Senate bets inendorso ng grupong El Shaddai
item.description: Aabot sa 14 kandidato sa pagkasenador ang inendorso ng charismatic prayer group na El Shaddai para sa paparating na halalan sa Mayo 13.

item.title: El Shaddai endorses 14 candidates in senatorial polls
item.description: The list, announced on Saturday, is made primarily of candidates from Hugpong ng Pagbabago, with a mix of some independent and opposition candidates.

item.title: Estrada sibling rivalry pits 'real one' vs 'good one'
item.description: As the May elections drew near, and survey results started coming in, the feuding sons of former President Joseph Estrada predictably turned against the other, using carefully crafted campaign ads.

item.title: OPINION: 2019 midterm elections: Crossroad of Philippine politics
item.description: I am voting for change. I am voting for federalism. I am voting for a change in the rules of the game.

item.title: Tumatakbong konsehal tinambangan sa La Union
item.description: Tinambangan ang isang tumatakbong konsehal sa bayan ng Balaoan, La Union nitong Biyernes ng gabi.

item.title: Comelec, naghahanap ng 'citizen arm' matapos tanggihan ng Namfrel
item.description: Sampung araw bago ang halalan, hinigpitan na ng PNP ang seguridad sa bansa.

item.title: Pagkatao, plataporma hanap ng mga botante sa Halalan 2019
item.description: Ano nga ba ang hinahanap ng mga botante sa mga kandidatong kanilang iboboto ngayong halalan?

item.title: Comelec seeks 'citizen arm' after Namfrel rejects accreditation
item.description: The Commission on Elections is scrambling to look for a new partner for the random manual audit (RMA) 10 days before the midterm polls.

item.title: Bayan Muna partylist still frontrunner in May polls: Pulse Asia
item.description: A new pre-election survey shows only a small fraction of all the registered partylist groups in the Philippines may win seats in the House of Representatives.

item.title: 13 party-list may tiyansang makakuha ng puwesto sa Kamara: Pulse Asia
item.description: Labintatlong party-list ang may tiyansang mabigyan ng puwesto sa Kongreso pagkatapos ng halalan.

item.title: Hugpong, PDP bets nag-ikot sa Central Luzon
item.description: Hindi lang pag-iikot ang tinotodo ng senatorial slate ng administrasyon kundi pati ang mga pangako sa mga botante.

item.title: Otso Diretso bets itinangging may kinalaman sila sa 'Bikoy' video
item.description: Itinanggi ng mga kandidato ng Otso Diretso na may kaugnayan nila sa "Bikoy" video.

item.title: Ombudsman suspends La Union mayor over plaza rehab
item.description: The Office of the Ombudsman issued a preventive suspension order against San Fernando City, La Union Mayor Hermenegildo “Dong” Gualberto due to the alleged misuse of local government’s funds.

item.title: LP denies alleged links to 'Bikoy' videos
item.description: Otso Diretso candidates on Friday denied the Liberal Party's (LP) involvement in the dissemination of videos of a certain "Bikoy" who alleged that the family of President Duterte was involved in the illegal drug trade.

item.title: 13 of 134 party-lists likely to secure Congress seats in May polls: Pulse Asia
item.description: Thirteen of the 134 party-lists registered in the midterm polls could secure Congressional seats as only three-fourths of voters aware of the party-list system, a Pulse Asia survey released Friday showed.

item.title: Senate hopeful Elmer Francisco not deterred by low survey rank
item.description: Out of the 1,800 adults polled by Pulse Asia, only 0.9 percent said they would vote for senatorial bet Elmer Francisco.

item.title: Marking pens na gagamitin sana sa halalan sa Apayao, ipinapa-recall
item.description: Ipinabalik ng Commission on Elections (Comelec) ang mga marking pen na gagamitin sana sa halalan ng mga presinto sa Apayao dahil matagal umano matuyo ang tinta ng mga bagong panulat, sabi ng mga lokal na opisyal dito sa lungsod, Biyernes.

item.title: Pagrenda sa presyo ng bilihin, hiling sa mga mananalo sa halalan
item.description: Hinaing ng marami na matugunan ng mga mahahalal na opisyal ang isyu ng kahirapan.

item.title: VP Leni tuloy sa pangangampanya sa Otso Diretso
item.description: Puspusan na ang pangangampanya ng ilang kandidato ng Otso Diretso.

item.title: Mayor Sara di kakasuhan ang nag-upload ng 'Bikoy' videos
item.description: Wala raw balak si Sara Duterte na kasuhan ang nag-upload umano ng 'Bikoy videos.'

item.title: Botohan ng mga Pinoy sa Italy inulan ng reklamo
item.description: May ilang reklamo ang mga Pinoy sa Europa sa pagpapatuloy ng overseas absentee voting.

item.title: #ANCMyVote: Businesswoman bets on candidates who will continue admin's positive reforms
item.description: Today, we introduce a businesswoman who is keen on voting for candidates who will continue what she describes as the positive reforms of the current administration.
